title: A quantum memory with telecom-wavelength conversion
title_cn: 具有电信波长转换的量子存储器
abstract: In a fibre-based quantum information network, telecom-wavelength transmission between quantum memory elements is required to minimize absorption. Owing to the paucity of suitable ground-state atomic transitions, a quantum memory interfaced with telecom light has not been previously realized. We report its demonstration by converting to telecom wavelength near-infrared light emitted on a ground-state transition. The conversion is achieved with a diamond configuration of atomic transitions, in an optically thick gas of cold rubidium. The quantum memory is also realized with cold rubidium, but confined in an optical lattice to suppress motional dephasing on a submillisecond timescale. We observe quantum memory lifetimes in excess of 0.1 s by laser compensation of the lattice light shifts that limited the previous generation of atomic memory to 7 ms. By measuring quantum correlations of light fields before and after telecom down-conversion, transmission and up-conversion, we demonstrate a basic memory element for a scalable, long-distance quantum network.
abstract_cn: 在基于光纤的量子信息网络中，需要在量子存储元件之间进行电信波长传输，以最大程度地减少吸收。由于缺乏合适的基态原子跃迁，与电信光接口的量子存储器以前尚未实现。我们通过将基态跃迁发射的近红外光转换为电信波长来报告其演示。在光学上较厚的冷rub气体中，通过原子跃迁的金刚石构型实现转化。量子存储器也可以用冷rub来实现，但要限制在光学晶格中，以抑制亚毫秒级时域的运动相移。通过对晶格光偏移进行激光补偿，我们将量子存储器的寿命超过了0.1 s，从而将上一代原子存储限制为7 ms。通过测量电信下转​​换，传输和上转换之前和之后的光场的量子相关性，我们演示了可扩展的长距离量子网络的基本存储元件。

title: A finite-temperature phase transition for disordered weakly interacting bosons in one dimension
title_cn: 一维无序弱相互作用玻色子的有限温度相变
abstract: It is commonly accepted that there are no phase transitions in one-dimensional systems at a finite temperature, because long-range correlations are destroyed by thermal fluctuations. Here we show theoretically that the one-dimensional gas of short-range interacting bosons in the presence of disorder can undergo a finite-temperature phase transition between two distinct states: fluid and insulator. Neither of these states has long-range spatial correlations, but this is a true, albeit non-conventional, phase transition, because transport properties are singular at the transition point. In the fluid phase, mass transport is possible, whereas in the insulator phase it is completely blocked even at finite temperatures. This study thus provides insight into how the interaction between disordered bosons influences their Anderson localization. This question, first raised for electrons in solids, is now crucial for the studies of atomic bosons, where recent experiments have demonstrated Anderson localization in expanding dilute quasi-one-dimensional clouds.
abstract_cn: 一维系统在有限温度下不存在相变是众所周知的，因为热波动会破坏远距离相关性。在这里，我们从理论上证明，在无序存在的情况下，短程相互作用的玻色子的一维气体可以在两种不同的状态（流体和绝缘体）之间经历有限温度的相变。这两个状态都不具有远距离的空间相关性，但这是一个真实的（尽管是非常规的）相变，因为传输特性在过渡点处是奇异的。在液相中，可以进行传质，而在绝缘体中，即使在有限的温度下也可以完全阻止。因此，这项研究提供了对无序玻色子之间的相互作用如何影响其安德森定位的见解。这个问题最初是针对固体中的电子提出的，现在对原子玻色子的研究至关重要。在该领域中，最近的实验证明了安德森在稀疏拟一维云中的局限性。

title: Loss of nodal quasiparticle integrity in underdoped YBa2Cu3O6+x
title_cn: 掺杂不足的YBa2Cu3O6 + x中节点准粒子完整性的损失
abstract: A central question in the study of high-temperature superconductivity is whether this phenomenon is linked to the doped antiferromagnetic Mott insulator or whether it emerges from a Fermi-liquid state across the whole cuprate phase diagram. Discriminating between these orthogonal cases hinges on the quantitative determination of the elusive quasiparticle strength Z as a function of hole-doping p, from the heavily overdoped to the deeply underdoped regime. Here we show, by means of angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy and an in situ doping technique, that the electronic structure of the overdoped metal (0.24≤p≤0.37) is in remarkable agreement with density functional theory and Fermi-liquid-like descriptions. However, below p≈0.10–0.15, we observe the loss of nodal quasiparticle integrity. This marks a clear departure from Fermi-liquid behaviour and a more rapid than expected crossover to Mott physics, indicating that the physical properties of underdoped cuprates are dominated by incoherent excitations.
abstract_cn: 高温超导性研究的中心问题是该现象是否与掺杂的反铁磁Mott绝缘子有关，还是在整个铜酸盐相图中从费米液体状态出现。在这些正交情况之间的区别取决于定量测定难以确定的准粒子强度Z随空穴掺杂p的变化，从重掺杂到重掺杂。在这里，我们通过角度分辨光发射光谱法和原位掺杂技术表明，过量掺杂的金属（0.24＆＃8804; p＆＃8804; 0.37）的电子结构与密度泛函理论和费米类似液体的描述。但是，低于p＆＃8776; 0.10＆＃8211; 0.15，我们观察到节点准颗粒完整性的损失。这标志着与费米-液态行为的明显偏离，并且比莫特物理学更快地超出了预期范围，这表明掺杂不足的铜酸盐的物理性质受非相干激发的支配。

title: Far-field optical imaging and manipulation of individual spins with nanoscale resolution
title_cn: 远场光学成像和纳米级分辨率的单个自旋操纵
abstract: A fundamental limit to existing optical techniques for measurementand manipulation of spin degrees of freedom is set by diffraction, which does not allow spins separated by less than about a quarter of a micrometre to be resolved using conventional far-field optics. Here, we report an efficient far-field optical technique that overcomes the limiting role of diffraction, allowing individual electronic spins to be detected, imaged and manipulated coherently with nanoscale resolution. The technique involves selective flipping of the orientation of individual spins, associated with nitrogen-vacancy centres in room-temperature diamond, using a focused beam of light with intensity vanishing at a controllable location, which enables simultaneous single-spin imaging and magnetometry at the nanoscale with considerably less power than conventional techniques. Furthermore, by inhibiting spin transitions away from the laser intensity null, selective coherent rotation of individual spins is realized. This technique can be extended to subnanometre dimensions, thus enabling applications in diverse areas ranging from quantum information science to bioimaging.
abstract_cn: 通过衍射设定了用于测量和操纵自旋自由度的现有光学技术的基本极限，这不允许使用常规的远场光学器件分辨小于约四分之一微米的自旋。在这里，我们报告了一种有效的远场光学技术，该技术克服了衍射的局限性，允许以纳米级分辨率相干地检测，成像和操纵单个电子自旋。该技术包括使用聚焦光束在室温可控位置消失，选择性地翻转各个自旋的取向，与室温金刚石中的氮空位中心相关联，从而可以在纳米级同时进行单旋成像和磁力分析与传统技术相比，功耗要低得多。此外，通过抑制自旋跃迁远离激光强度零，实现了各个自旋的选择性相干旋转。该技术可以扩展到亚纳米级，因此可以在从量子信息科学到生物成像的各个领域中应用。</ p>

title: Trionic optical potential for electrons in semiconductors
title_cn: 半导体中电子的三极子光学势
abstract: Laser-induced optical potentials for atoms have led to remarkable advances in precision measurement, quantum information and towards addressing fundamental questions in condensed-matter physics. Here, we describe analogous optical potentials for electrons in quantum wells and wires that can be generated by optically driving the transition between a single electron and a three-body electron–exciton bound state, known as a trion. The existence of a bound trion state adds a term to the a.c. Stark shift of the material proportional to the light intensity at the position of the electron. According to our theoretical calculations, this shift can be large relative to the thermal equilibrium temperature of the electron, resulting in a relatively strong optical potential that could be used to trap, guide and manipulate individual electrons within a semiconductor quantum well or wire. These potentials can be thought of as artificial nanostructures on the scale of 100 nm that can be spin dependent and reconfigurable in real time. Our results suggest the possibility of integrating ultrafast optics and gate voltages in new resolved-carrier semiconductor optoelectronic devices, with potential applications in fields such as nanoelectronics, spintronics and quantum information processing.
abstract_cn: 激光诱导的原子光势已导致精密测量，量子信息方面的显着进步，并解决了凝聚态物理中的基本问题。在这里，我们描述了量子阱和导线中电子的类似光势，这些光可以通过光学驱动单个电子与三体电子激子束缚态（称为三重子）之间的跃迁而产生。绑定的Trion状态的存在为a.c添加了一个术语。材料的斯塔克位移与电子位置的光强度成正比。根据我们的理论计算，相对于电子的热平衡温度，此偏移可能很大，从而导致相对较强的光势，该光势可用于捕获，引导和操纵半导体量子阱或导线中的各个电子。这些潜力可以被认为是规模为100纳米的人造纳米结构，可以自旋并且可以实时重新配置。我们的结果表明，将超快光学器件和栅极电压集成到新的解析载流子半导体光电器件中的可能性，在纳米电子学，自旋电子学和量子信息处理等领域具有潜在的应用。</ p>
